extracted-table.table-caption: Regression analysis showing the effect of group (bipolar-controls) on functional connectivity (Pearson’s correlation) of the cerebellar vermis.

caption.p: Regression analysis showing the effect of group (bipolar-controls) on functional connectivity (Pearson’s correlation) of the cerebellar vermis.

table-wrap-foot.p: All results with an uncorrected p-value < 0.001 are shown along with their false discovery rate q-value and regression beta coefficient for the effect of group. The regression analysis included covariates for age, sex, and tSNR.
